    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public static java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the current username. Username is also stored in a list of all users which is used to check if a user already exists. Example of a username: the string "Bob".
        Returns:
        current user's username

      • setName

        public static void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the current username. Username is used when comment is displayed. Example of a username: the string "Bob". User can set their own username from the login page.
        Parameters:
        name - username of the current user
